overview: A student revolt as re-lived by the students themselves, The Hornsey Film reconstructs the arguments and succession of events that led to the occupation of Hornsey College of Art between May and July 1968. Over six weeks, the publication and distribution of more than seventy documents sparked a debate about art education beyond the confines of the college.
tagline: A student revolt as relived by the rebels themselves.
title: The Hornsey Film
